messages.subject: Sept and Oct blog carnivals
messages.msgSnippet: September s blog carnival Unschooling Plus is here: http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/2010/09/unschooling-plus-september-2010-blog-car nival/ October s theme
messages.messageBody:
September's blog carnival "Unschooling Plus" is here:
http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/2010/09/unschooling-plus-september-2010-blog-car\
nival/

October's theme comes from a Twitter follower/friend Diana Jenner. The
discussion was about people's reasons for unschooling. Why do you unschool? Is
it a feeling or did you come to it by trial and error or much research?

This theme is pretty open-ended. Think about not just what thoughts and
experiences led you to the path you're currently on, but what daily reminders
life may present you that your particular choices are right.

Please respond by Sept 28, at
http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/blog-carnival/

Thanks!
Enjoy Life
